preferences.description: This chat won't appear in history or be used to train our models. For safety purposes, OpenAI may keep a copy of this chat for up to 30 days.

preferences.title: Extra Query Params
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of additional query parameters to include in the ChatGPT Search URL. Useful for customizations.
